short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helper toggles for users of CSDN

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a helper tool for users of CSDN.
The extension provides a popup managing a couple of toggles to change CSDN copy content behaviours, including
- toggle for enabling copying content without actually logging into CSDN
- toggle for enabling copying content with default behaviour without adding copyright-related information at the end of content.
